entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:36 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 02:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -9.7°C
Wind: NE 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with ice pellets late this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 9:55 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 9:55 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
